meanings.definition: Made or shaped in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The old-fashioned clock ticked loudly in the hallway.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautifully fashioned dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The fashionably fashioned hat made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His old-fashioned manners were a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The uniquely fashioned necklace caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: Created or designed in a particular style.
meanings.sent1: The vintage-fashioned car turned heads as it drove by.
meanings.sent2: The artist's latest painting was exquisitely fashioned.
meanings.sent3: The traditionally fashioned furniture added charm to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her elegantly fashioned hairdo was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The classically fashioned building stood out among the modern structures.

meanings.definition: Adapted or modified to fit a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: The custom-fashioned tool made the job much easier.
meanings.sent2: The specially fashioned software met all our needs.
meanings.sent3: The uniquely fashioned key opened the mysterious door.
meanings.sent4: His cleverly fashioned plan saved the day.
meanings.sent5: The perfectly fashioned solution solved the problem instantly.
